summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1259, for the improvement of Second Avenue from a point one hundred twenty (120) feet north of Cedar Street to Denny Way, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing a sewer therein of proper dimensions, together with all necessary appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 13839, and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
